Title: Creates a volunteer firefighter scholarship program and a volunteer firefighter scholarship fund; appropriation
Summary: Creates a volunteer firefighter scholarship program and a volunteer firefighter scholarship fund; rewards volunteer firefighters who respond to twenty-five percent of emergency calls for eight years with a student loan award equal to four times the SUNY tuition rate; makes an appropriation therefor.
